UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Anim
UseTemplate.ANIM_CODE: (A:AILERON LEFT DEFLECTION PCT, Percent) 1.25 * (A:AILERON TRIM PCT, Percent) + 100 min -100 max 0.5 * 50 +

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Anim

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Anim

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Anim

OverrideTemplateParameters.IS_TAKING_OFF_CONDITION: (A:GROUND VELOCITY, Knots) s0 #MIN_SPEED_DISABLE_HYDRAULICS# > (A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:#ENG_ID#, Percent) 30 > and (A:GENERAL ENG PCT MAX RPM:#ENG_ID#, Percent) 20 > and l0 #MIN_SPEED_TAKEOFF_HYDRAULICS# < and

OverrideTemplateParameters.ANIM_CODE_RIGHT_BASE: 0.5 (A:AILERON RIGHT DEFLECTION PCT, Percent over 100) -0.5 * + (A:TRAILING EDGE FLAPS RIGHT PERCENT, Percent over 100) 0.4 * +
